com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.events

Class SignChangeActionEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.event.Event
      • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.events.SignActionEvent
        • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.events.SignChangeActionEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Cancellable

    public class SignChangeActionEvent
extends SignActionEvent
    A sign action event meant to represent a sign that has just been placed, or has changed
    This ensures that the sign can still properly be interacted with
